{"id":721423008,"lang":"java","time":"1 day, 18 hours","timestamp":1655142796,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2612 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/721423008/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"46.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public List<List<Integer>> threeSum(int[] nums) {\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        int n = nums.length;\n        List<List<Integer>> ans = new ArrayList<>();\n        if (n<3){\n            return ans;\n        }\n        for(int i =0; i<n; i++){\n            int j = i+1;\n            int k = n-1;\n            int r = -1*nums[i];\n            while(j<k){\n                if(nums[j] + nums[k] <r){\n                    j++;\n                }\n                else if (nums[j] + nums[k]>r){\n                    k--;\n                }\n                else{\n                    List<Integer> ls = new ArrayList<>();\n                    ls.add(nums[i]); ls.add(nums[j]); ls.add(nums[k]);\n                    if (!ans.contains(ls))\n                        ans.add(ls);\n                    j++; k--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
